reference.shortdesc: The info element contains additional information about the step.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The info element is specialized from itemgroup. It is defined in the task module.

example.title: Example
example.p: In the following code sample, the info element provides additional information about the ways that the step can be performed.
example.codeblock: <step> <cmd>Specify the configuration parameters.</cmd> <info>The configuration parameters can be specified from either the command line or the product GUI.</info> </step>
